name: Dragon X Collection 2023 Edition
description:
Games (fleshed out)

  • Polaris V5
  • Polaris V4.2
  • Dragon X Moonstone (one large map)
  • Polaris Containment (Version 2.0.0)
  • Dragon XT2
  • Dragon X2 Remake (2021 version)

Tech Demos

  • Dragon Dark Core
  • Dragon Ruby
  • Aeon/Polaris Demo Map (conceptual demo)

Instructions (how to run)

Open the Windowsnoeditor folder and click on the Unreal Icon to start the game. Then the game should load.

This is a collection of games/tech demos I have made from 2021-2022 (mostly 2022) I am reposting work I intially took down (because the site I originally used to host it is being associated with scam operations Mediafire) So as a result of this I am posting my games as one collection to avoid being seen as a scam. If that makes sense, hopefully you enjoy some of the stuff I made , Thanks for checking the collection out.
